name: xl_tiv.vim
summary: Translate sequences of ampersand-pound-digits-semicolon in html source
description:
Source for vimtip #217.

I found a website *cough*Tivoli.com*cough* that likes to obfuscate some of its help file web pages using ampersand-pound-digits-semicolon instead of normal ascii.  If you load the source with Vim (in Opera you can just designate Vim as your source viewing program), you can :so xl_tiv.vim to make it readable.
install_details: Open an html file in Vim.  Source xl_tiv.vim.
